title: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view immediately filters. It is expected that the filtering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating. Additionally, pressing cancel should revert any changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
OB: The package view in the background refilters immediately when removing a working set.
EB: The package view should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog. Pressing cancel should revert any changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
SR:
1. Open the working set selection dialog.
2. Remove a working set.
3. Observe that the package view immediately refilters.
4. Close the working set selection dialog.
5. Verify that the package view does not filter again.
6. Repeat steps 1-3 and press cancel before closing the dialog.
7. Verify that any changes made to the working sets, including the remove operation, are reverted.
